content.raw:
How about adding a script to `package.xml` so that we can call `npm run sdf_build`? I think this does it:

~~~
diff -r b00e1aa4fe48 package.json
--- a/package.json	Tue Sep 12 22:00:04 2017 +0200
+++ b/package.json	Tue Sep 12 13:16:19 2017 -0700
@@ -7,7 +7,8 @@
     "url": "#!/osrf/gzweb"
   },
   "scripts": {
-    "test": "./node_modules/karma/bin/karma start --singleRun"
+    "test": "./node_modules/karma/bin/karma start --singleRun",
+    "sdf_build": "cd gz3d/utils grunt sdf_build cd ../.."
   },
   "dependencies": {
     "websocket": "",
~~~

Eventually we should start using these scripts and retire `updateGZ3D.sh`
